# Bio

### Hi I'm Lucas!

I am a data and analytics professional with over 10 years of experience in business
operations and analytics. I have expertise in multiple industries including retail,
manufacturing, non-profit and marketing.

I have a proven track record of improving business operations and driving ROI true 
insights and action.

I love digging into data to understand how various business components affect top-line 
revenue. This helps with better revenue modeling as well as understanding what 
levers can be used to drive revenue while eliminating inefficiencies.
